block.p: Anna Rebecca Weber and Dr. Martin Bruce Schapiro are to be married today in Manhattan by Rabbi Daniel Wolk at the Regent Wall Street hotel.
The bride, 35, is the director of program planning and administration at Carnegie Hall in New York. She graduated from Cornell and also from the executive M.B.A. program at Columbia.
Anna Rebecca Weber and Dr. Martin Bruce Schapiro are to be married today in Manhattan at the Regent Wall Street hotel.
Anna Rebecca Weber and Dr. Martin Bruce Schapiro are to be married today in Manhattan by Rabbi Daniel Wolk at the Regent Wall Street hotel.
The bride, 35, is the director of program planning and administration at Carnegie Hall in New York. She graduated from Cornell and also from the executive M.B.A. program at Columbia.

She is a daughter of Dr. Joan Weber and Dr. Carl Weber of Purchase, N.Y. The bride's father is a general surgeon with Weber, Homan & Weber, a group practice in White Plains, and a former director of the surgical department at White Plains Hospital. Her mother is an assistant superintendent of schools in Scarsdale, N.Y., and a school board member of the Hawthorne Cedar Knolls Union Free School District in Hawthorne, N.Y.

The bridegroom, 49, is a dentist practicing privately in Hartsdale, N.Y. He graduated from the University of Pennsylvania and received a D.D.S. degree from New York University. He is the son of Regina Schapiro and Dr. Bertram Schapiro of White Plains. The bridegroom's father, a retired dentist, had a private practice in Scarsdale, which his wife managed.
